original_text: ‘Sir,’ he said, ‘My servant is lying in bed at home. He cannot move his legs and he has a lot of pain.’
korean_text: 이르되 주여 내 하인이 중풍병으로 집에 누워 몹시 괴로워하나이다

sentences.original_text: 'My servant is lying in bed at home'
and he has a lot of pain.'
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 많은 고통을 겪고 있습니다.'
